item.description:
City Lights is a fine gallery always offering interesting art.

The reception is from 5:30 to 8:30, but I will be there from 5:30 to about 7pm (or 7:15pm), at

which time, we can go to one of the local bar/burger places.

The address is indicated below.  For further details. see: http://www.citylightsgallery.org/

 

City Lights 37 Markle Court
Bridgeport, CT 06604 203-334-7748
item.how_to_find_us: Its a medium sized space and its easy to spot the organizer, Ray, who has a green shopping bag with his art supplies!
item.name: Artists Reception - City Lights - Bridgeport, CT
